description: Birthwort (Aristolochia leuconeura) is an amazing plant species, with its wonderfully unique heart-shaped leaves and star-shaped, ivory-colored flowers. It's hardy and long-lived, thriving in most conditions from full sun to partial shade. As a native European species, it is an easy to care for, low maintenance ornamental. When grown in warmer climates, it is an exceptionally drought-tolerant plant, making it suitable for xeriscaping. Its butter-cup yellow markings also stand out against other foliage, giving any garden an unmistakable beauty and complete appeal.Birthwort is a delightful addition to any garden and will give any landscape a touch of elegance.
